channel.title: Prestigescape GFX Designer Needed!
channel.description:
Hi I Need A GFX Designer, Who Will Make My Advertisement Banners ECT New Logo ect client background.
you can stay as a member in the Development team, once on forums you will receive your own crown, personalized or default.
What we have for our server... VPS: 6GB 2.0GHz Six Core AMD 100GB
And we have a separate WEBHOST for forums + Vbulletin 4.2 (Paid For with licence)
I Will give you an example and i want you to make and see if you can :)
Name/Nickname: Age: Why would you like to join this project: How would you to contribute to this project: Position wanted: Anything else you want me to know: Skype: Msn:
If you do not have skype... make one its easier to communicate as all my coders have it and so do i. Message Me ASAP. Thank You For Your Time
